snippet: With frigid temperature expected, organizers of a protest planned for Saturday are scrambling for ideas to maintain the movement’s momentum — without freezing.
abstract: Organizers of Russia's budding protest movement scramble for ideas to entice people out to rally in Moscow during freezing temperatures; cold weather is just one of the challenges confronting the movement, which is struggling to maintain its momentum as country heads into presidential election.
lead_paragraph: With frigid temperature expected, organizers of a protest planned for Saturday are scrambling for ideas to maintain the movement’s momentum — without freezing.

headline.seo: Anti-Putin Protesters Challenged by Russia’s Subzero Forecast
headline.main: At Moscow Rally, Fighting the Cold and the Kremlin
headline.print_headline: Fighting Cold and Kremlin In Planning for a Protest
